title: A Better Future For Animals
description: In the ConstraintLayout example, constraints are specified inline, with a modifier in the composable they're applied

title: Creative Motion
description: However, there are situations when it's preferable to decouple the constraints from the layouts they apply to. For example

title: Masterpiece

title: Emotion
description: ConstraintLayout contains concepts such as guidelines, barriers, and chains that can help with positioning elements inside your composable.
